alert.note: Alert for Pleasants; Ritchie; Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pleasants, north central Ritchie and southwestern Tyler Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middlebourne, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrisville, St. Marys, Pennsboro, Ellenboro, Arvilla, Point Lookout, Wick, Mountain, Hebron, Pike, Maxwell and Highland. This includes Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 36 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
